Chinese: 这个是否适合在下使用？
使用<标语/宣传口号/广告>来描述这个恰当吗？
这个是否与<标语/宣传口号/广告>的描述相符合？
<标语/宣传口号/广告>是否适合用来表达这个的特点？
这首古诗是否适合用来这个？
<故事/童话/科普介绍/推荐信/电子邮件>是否适合用来这个？
English: Is this suitable for use under ?
Is it appropriate to use to describe this ?
Does this match the description of the ?
Is the suitable for expressing the characteristics of this ?
Is this ancient poem suitable for this ?
Is suitable for this ?

Chinese: 根据这张，写一篇<故事/童话/科普介绍/推荐信/电子邮件>。
关于中的
撰写一篇<text_type>，推荐图中的<object>。
撰写一首描述中
为这个<object>撰写一则推荐语。
推荐在中看到的
给<somebody>写封电子邮件，介绍图片中的内容。
根据内容，我想与朋友分享这个，该如何推荐。
这个适用于什么<用途/场景>？
为图中产品写一个符合产品特点的<标语/宣传口号/广告>？
English: Based on this , write a .
Write an article about
Write an article <text_type> and recommend the <object> in the picture.
Write a poem describing the
Write a recommendation for this <object>.
Recommend the
Write an email to <somebody> describing the content in the image.
Based on the content of , I want to share this with my friends. How should I recommend it?
What is this suitable for?
Write a <slogan/slogan/advertisement> for the product in the picture that fits the characteristics of the product?
